summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: 10Pcs 3D Face Inner Silicone Bracket for Comfortable Breathing, Washable Reusable Silicone Bracket Under Frame Lipstick Protector Keep Fabric off Mouth to Create More Breathing Space Review Date: 2020/12/09 Store: Blaikepcam Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 6.18 x 3.43 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} Review Text: These silicon brackets were the best product I ever purchased. It has made breathing so much easy while wearing masks. I normally wear glasses so whenever I wear a mask it always fogs with my glasses esp when it's cold outside. After putting these on I am finally able to breathe and not worry about the way the fabric touches my face when I am walking outside and no fogs in my glasses. The brackets were lightweight and comfortable to wear,great buy in these difficult times. Review Title: Great design!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Organic Roll On Essential Oils Set, 100% Pure USDA Certified - Protector Blend (Based on 4 Thieves Legend) & Lemongrass with Black Leather Travel Case Review Date: 2021/05/11 Store: Red Silk Essentials Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Red Silk Essentials', 'Scent': 'Lemongrass', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Organic', 'Liquid Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 4.09 x 3.86 inches; 7.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '753068385595', 'Manufacturer': 'Red Silk Essentials'} Review Text: Pros:
The oil was high quality.
The oil smells great.
The carrying case is well made and useful.

Cons
Cannot think of any !!! Review Title: Great set!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: FASCY LAB GREEN+ Korean Sunscreen — SPF 50+PA++++, Daily Facial Sunscreen, Sun Cream With Patented Ingredients, Korean Spf, Korean Sun Cream for Face — Paraben Free [1 x 1.69 Fl.Oz.] Review Date: 2021/05/25 Store: Fascy Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Sun Protection': '50 SPF', 'Item Weight': '50 Milligrams', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Item model number': 'KC'} Review Text: Pros:
Did not irritate my sensitive skin
Feels like it moisture well
Works well as a sunscreen

Cons:
Cannot think of any!!! Review Title: Great Sunscreen!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. Review Date: 2021/05/29 Store: Alyxxndra Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Color': 'Black', 'Brand': 'Alyxxndra', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Disposable', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Package Dimensions': '9.21 x 6.1 x 0.71 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '788402874992', 'Manufacturer': 'Alyxxndra'} Review Text: Pros:
Lashes look great
Easy to apply
Stayed on the whole day
Reusable

Cons:
Cannot think of any !!! Review Title: Great eyelash kit !!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Asenlin Hair Ties Bands 4MM Durable Neutral Ouchless Accessories for Women Men Girls No Metal Elastics Thick Tie with Strong Ponytail Holder and for Medium Hair(24 Count of 3 Pack)-Black Review Date: 2021/09/06 Store: Asenlin Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Material': 'Metal, Cotton, Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Asenlin', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.2 x 0.09 x 0.02 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Product Dimensions': '0.2 x 0.09 x 0.02 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '779663992884'} Review Text: Pros:
Well made and relatively durable
Holds my hair in place
Odorless

Cons:
Cannot think of any!!! Review Title: Nice hair ties !!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Pobam Pore Clean Kaolin Clay Mask - Natural Vegan Daily Korean Facial Skincare for removing blackheads, moisturizing, clearing sebum, soothing; Paraben-Free, EWG Verified, for All Skin Types Review Date: 2021/10/15 Store: Pobam Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pobam', 'Item Form': 'Clay', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Package Dimensions': '6.97 x 1.34 x 1.34 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} Review Text: Pros:
Easy to use
I notice my pores seem smaller after the use of this mask
My skin feels moisturized after using this mask

Cons:
Cannot think of any!!! Review Title: Really Good Clay Mask!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ZEROID Intensive Lotion Korean Dermocosmetic Intensive Care for Severe Dry & Disordered Skin (200 mL) Review Date: 2021/10/15 Store: ZEROID Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZEROID', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '6.76 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.75 x 1.75 x 7 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': '00302'} Review Text: Pros:
My skin feels great after use
I like the light scent of this lotion
Did not irritate my sensitive skin

Cons:
Cannot think of any!!! Review Title: Awesome Lotion!!! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Comfort & Functionality**:
   - Preference for products that enhance comfort, especially for wearing masks and glasses (e.g., silicone brackets).
   - High ratings for ease of use and effectiveness in daily activities.

2. **Natural & Organic Choices**:
   - Seeks organic and high-quality ingredients (essential oils, lotions) that are gentle on sensitive skin.
   - Favors products that are paraben-free and safe for various skin types.

3. **Beauty & Care Products**:
   - Interest in cosmetic products such as skincare, hair accessories, and makeup, with a focus on quality and effectiveness.
   - Positive feedback on multifunctional beauty items (e.g., magnetic eyelashes, pore-cleansing masks).

4. **Durability & Reusability**:
   - Values products that are durable and offer reusability (e.g., hair ties, eyelashes).
   - Consistently chooses well-made items that maintain functionality over time.

5. **Simplicity & Positive Experiences**:
   - Reviews consistently highlight simplicity in application and immediate positive effects.
   - Shows a trend towards expressing satisfaction with the absence of drawbacks in product performance. 

**Overall Trend**: The individual leans towards practical, high-quality, and skin-friendly products, showing a willingness to invest in solutions that offer comfort and ease in everyday use.
